Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook

Class Notebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook.Notebook
  • public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Notebook object in the WolfTasks system. A Notebook is a collection of TaskLists It has a name, a field for a SortedList of all TaskLists, a field for a list of all Tasks marked active, and a field for a current TaskList
    Author:
    owenloker, magolden

      • addTaskList

        public void addTaskList​(TaskList taskList)
        Adds a TaskList to the Notebook
        Parameters:
        taskList - to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - with the message "Invalid name." if the tasklist name is the name of the active task list or a duplicate

      • getTaskListsNames

        public java.lang.String[] getTaskListsNames()
        Gets the names of all the TaskLists as a String array Active tasks is set to the spot in index 0. the rest of the TaskLists are listed in their sorted order
        Returns:
        names String array of TaskList names

      • editTaskList

        public void editTaskList​(java.lang.String taskListName)
        Changes the name of a TaskList.
        Parameters:
        taskListName - new name of TaskList
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the current task list is an active task list
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the current task list has the name of an active task list
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the task list name is already in the list of tasklists
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the task list name is the name of the current task list

      • removeTaskList

        public void removeTaskList()
        Removes a TaskList from the Notebook
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the current task list has the name of an active task list

      • addTask

        public void addTask​(Task task)
        Adds a Task to a TaskList
        Parameters:
        task - to be added

      • editTask

        public void editTask​(int idx,
                     java.lang.String taskName,
                     java.lang.String taskDescription,
                     boolean recurring,
                     boolean active)
        Edits a task
        Parameters:
        idx - Unique index of the task that will be edited
        taskName - name of task
        taskDescription - task description
        recurring - boolean value true if the task is recurring
        active - boolean value true if the task is active
